resources.string: Loop Coding Center (LCC) is committed to find new and innovative ways to support students and to strengthen the impact of youth in technology through educational workshops and classes in our community. The Reason LCC exist is to solve the problem of lack of knowledge in computer coding and unprepared for the increase in job demand in every industry. We encourage parents who have kids from ages 11 - 18 enroll their kids in to this program to prepare them for the future.
